name: nunjucks-tag
description: 提供 nunjucks 的 Tag 基类, 方便快速自定义标签

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-local
scripts.cov: TEST_REPORTER=spec NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --recursive test --bail
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run cov
scripts.ci-travis: npm run lint && TEST_REPORTER=spec NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --recursive test --bail
